Notes.Text:
This update for libass fixes the following issues:

CVE-2016-7969, CVE-2016-7970, CVE-2016-7971, CVE-2016-7972: Fixed multiple memory allocation issues found by fuzzing (bsc#1002982).

Vulnerabilities.Description: The wrap_lines_smart function in ass_render.c in libass before 0.13.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via unspecified vectors, related to "0/3 line wrapping equalization."
